page.title: 03Employment in Southam
page.content: Employment opportunities in Southam are many including the usual service industries, a cement works and two industrial estates where light manufacturing takes place. A survey of local employment showed that 74% of those interviewed had full time jobs and 22% had part time work. Unemployment is not as high as in other parts of the country. 60% travelled out of Southam to work. The general stability of the work force was indicated by 45% having worked for over 10 years in their particular job. There was little night work or shift work indicated in the survey. Payment by cash is declining. Only 27% were paid in cash, 22% were paid by cheque and 51% were paid by direct credit into their bank accounts. 62% did not belong to any trade union or professional association.
